With the glowtite found on Menelaus, I could further develop the neon lamp. The energy-intensive insides are swapped with a new mixture. I use glowtite as an energy source, which in combination with glowstone (and a single energy supply) creates a plasma that I conceal inside the lamp using a magnetic field, where it emits light permanently.
This reaction, although not very powerful, is enough for a light source. Additionally, this lamp requires neither Neon energy nor redstone signals to function.
Using a Redstone signal, I can regulate the reaction enough so that the lamp emits no more light.
